about_the_game:
“Glory is others' acknowledgement of your exploits, tasks and feats of great physical strength. It is the force that imposes order over all things, and the reason why whole nations fight against one another. The Masses will proudly follow those honored by the halo that surrounds the heroes of each era.”

The Glory Kit will allow you to strengthen your Collection with Glory Cards (red). It includes:

  • 6 Glory Card Packs
  • 500 Organite
  • Unique Glory Card Back


Each Glory Card Pack includes 5 Cards of Glory (red) with different Rarity (Common, Rare, Epic, and Legendary), allowing you to start upgrading your Glory Decks, including the Faction (dual-colored) Decks.

Keep in mind that for every 20 Card Packs you open in the game, you’ll receive a Legendary Card Pack for free. This type of pack guarantees a Legendary Card.



Organite (Crystals) may be spent in the game to buy items such as Leaders (750 Organite), Card Packs (200 Organite), Card Backs (750 Organite), and more!



Add the Unique Glory Card Back to your collection, and showcase it while battling your enemies. After the end of the Early Access, this item will only be available by acquiring this kit.

This kit can only be purchased on Steam once per account. If you already had the Glory Card Back in your Collection, you will get all the other items included in the kit, and a full reimbursement of the Card Back in gold.
